cars.Name: Tesla Model S
cars.Description: A revolutionary electric sedan with impressive range and performance, setting the standard for electric vehicles.

cars.Name: Toyota Prius
cars.Description: The iconic hybrid vehicle known for its fuel efficiency and eco-friendly design, paving the way for green technology in cars.

cars.Name: Ford F-150
cars.Description: The best-selling truck in the U.S., now available with a hybrid powertrain, known for durability, performance, and capability.

cars.Name: Honda Civic
cars.Description: A reliable and affordable compact car with great fuel efficiency and a reputation for longevity.

cars.Name: BMW 3 Series
cars.Description: A luxury sports sedan known for its driving dynamics, comfort, and advanced technology features.

cars.Name: Chevrolet Corvette
cars.Description: An iconic American sports car with a mid-engine design, delivering outstanding performance and handling.

cars.Name: Porsche 911
cars.Description: A legendary sports car known for its precision engineering, distinctive design, and track performance.

cars.Name: Mercedes-Benz S-Class
cars.Description: A luxury flagship sedan that exemplifies comfort, cutting-edge technology, and safety features.

cars.Name: Jeep Wrangler
cars.Description: An iconic off-road SUV known for its rugged capability, open-air design, and adventurous spirit.

cars.Name: Audi A4
cars.Description: A premium compact sedan offering a balance of performance, comfort, and advanced technology.
